title: NumPy Dataset: Euclidean Distance
story: Calculate the Euclidean distance between two points in 3D space using vectorized NumPy operations. No loops, pure vector math!
instructions: Given two points p1=[1, 2, 3] and p2=[4, 6, 8], calculate Euclidean distance: sqrt((p1-p2)^2). Print the result rounded to 2 decimals.
starterCode:
import numpy as np

# Calculate Euclidean distance
p1 = np.array([1, 2, 3])
p2 = np.array([4, 6, 8])

# Vectorized: sqrt(sum((p1-p2)^2))
diff = p1 - p2
dist_squared = np.sum(diff ** 2)
distance = np.sqrt(dist_squared)
print(np.round(distance, 2))
